profileAlternative.name: Arshdeep Sandhu
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Apple
profileAlternative.summary:
- Analytical consulting professional with 3 years of in-depth experience in solving multiple business problems across Retail and Technology Domain for Fortune 500 companies
-Experience in Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, Predictive Modeling, Database Management and Team Management
-Leveraged decision sciences and statistical tools to define, analyze and obtain solutions for various projects
- Proficient in gathering business requirements, engaging with executive level stake holders and developing analytical road maps and delivering end solutions
- Proficiency at rapidly learning new technologies/businesses,data preparation and exploratory data analysis skills,on platforms like Hadoop, Greenplum, and Teradata along with Visualization tools like Microsoft Visual Studio, Tableau and MS Powerpoint

I want to leverage analytics to help organizations predict and respond to changes which influence their domains in a sustainable manner. I would like to do so by building, and utilizing robust data analytics systems which quicken the information flow required to make fact based decisions.

educations.title: Carnegie Mellon University
educations.degree: Masters of Information Systems Management - Business Intelligence and Data Analytics

given.text: I worked with Arshdeep as a client of hers while at Bing Ads. Arshdeep's work ethic and attention-to-detail are second to none. Despite working with her as a contractor, Arshdeep's commitment to her work and understanding of our business made her more of a colleague. Arshdeep is a master at communicating complex business trends and fluctuations through detailed data analysis. Her insights were vital to the operations of our business unit and allowed us to grow revenue through strategic sales and product improvements. I can't recommend Arshdeep enough and would absolutely love the opportunity to work with her again. See less

I had the opportunity to mentor Arshdeep during the first 6 months of her career at Mu Sigma. During this period she consistently showed high levels of commitment, flexibility and curiosity. She picked up responsibilities proactively and quickly went on to manage a one on one engagement with an important client, relatively early in her career.
Post this period too I had many opportunities to interact with her, and it was clear that she had only continued to get better, most likely due to her drive and desire to keep learning. I'm sure this quality will hold her in good stead throughout her career and that she will continue to be an asset to any team. See less

items: Data Warehouse for San Francisco Vendors
Content Analysis of Structured and Unstructured Data
